SELECT COUNT(distinct item.ITEM_GROUP_CODE) AS articleTotalNum FROM ITEM item, BRAND brand, ITEM_CATEGORY cate, CATEGORY3 cate3 WHERE item.ITEM_USE_YN='Y' AND item.BRAND_CODE=brand.BRAND_CODE AND cate.ITEM_GROUP_CODE = item.ITEM_GROUP_CODE AND cate.CATEGORY3_CODE = cate3.CATEGORY3_CODE AND item.ITEM_USE_YN = 'Y'
AND (item.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%$keyWord$%' OR brand.BRAND_NAME LIKE '%$keyWord$%')
AND (cate.CATEGORY3_CODE=#cateCode# OR cate3.CATEGORY2_CODE=#cateCode# OR cate3.CATEGORY1_CODE=#cateCode#)

SELECT e.*, item3.ITEM_CODE itemCode, item3.ITEM_SIZE_YN AS itemSizeYn,item3.ITEM_STATUS AS itemStatus, item3.ITEM_PIC_PATH as itemPicPath, item3.ITEM_PIC_SAVENAME as itemPicSavename, stock.STOCK_MARKET_PRICE AS itemMarketPrice, stock.STOCK_SELL_PRICE AS itemSellPrice, (stock.STOCK_SELL_PRICE/stock.STOCK_MARKET_PRICE*100) as itemDiscount FROM ITEM_STOCK stock, (select d.* FROM(SELECT @GR:=@GR+1 AS groupNum, c.* FROM(select @DI:=@DI+1 AS dispNum, b.* FROM(select a.*, item2.ITEM_GROUP_CODE AS itemGroupCode FROM (SELECT item.ITEM_CODE AS tempItemCode, item.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, item.ITEM_SCORE AS itemScore, brand.BRAND_NAME as brandName, COUNT(review.POSTING_CODE) AS reviewCnt FROM BRAND brand, ITEM_CATEGORY cate, CATEGORY3 cate3, ITEM item left join (SELECT POSTING_CODE, ITEM_GROUP_CODE FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_USE_YN='Y') review on item.ITEM_GROUP_CODE=review.ITEM_GROUP_CODE WHERE item.BRAND_CODE = brand.BRAND_CODE AND cate.ITEM_GROUP_CODE = item.ITEM_GROUP_CODE AND cate.CATEGORY3_CODE = cate3.CATEGORY3_CODE AND item.ITEM_USE_YN = 'Y'
AND (item.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%$keyWord$%' OR brand.BRAND_NAME LIKE '%$keyWord$%')
AND (cate.CATEGORY3_CODE=#cateCode# OR cate3.CATEGORY2_CODE=#cateCode# OR cate3.CATEGORY1_CODE=#cateCode#)
GROUP BY item.ITEM_CODE, item.ITEM_NAME, item.ITEM_SCORE, brand.BRAND_NAME ) a, ITEM item2 WHERE a.tempItemCode=item2.item_code GROUP BY item2.ITEM_GROUP_CODE )b,(SELECT @DI:=0) AS DI ORDER BY dispNum DESC )c,(SELECT @GR:=0) AS GR )d where d.groupNum between '1' and '1' )e left join ITEM item3 on e.itemGroupCode=item3.ITEM_GROUP_CODE where item3.ITEM_USE_YN = 'Y' and stock.ITEM_CODE = item3.ITEM_CODE order by itemSellPrice desc, e.groupNum;
